Class SetPreference

java.lang.Object

                  org.vfny.geoserver.services.SetPreference
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
public class SetPreference
extends AbstractPreferenceService

Provides a web interface for setting preferences.

To be invoked the service parameter must be wpss and the request paramter must be setPreference

A key parameter and a value parameter must be provided or a Service Exception response will be thrown

Example Request:

 http://localhost:8080/geoserver/wfs?service=wpss&request=setPreference&key=pref&value=newValue

The preference pref is being set to newValue.

Author:
Jesse
See Also:
SetDefault, GetPreference, IPreferenceStore, Serialized Form
